name: Revevol
tagline: The Game Changer in Cloud Business.
description:
Our ability to change the cloud business game comes from our pioneering experience, passion for technology, and thousands of hours working with clients around the globe to solve their organizational challenges with cloud solutions.
Revevol advises and assists clients in their adoption of Cloud technology. Founded in 2007, focused on “Pure Cloud Strategy”, Revevol has assembled a superlative offering of SaaS (Software as a Service) solutions: CRM, ERP, and BPM through partnerships with leading technology providers. A pioneer in the market, Revevol has unparalleled technical, advisory, and change management experience.
A key Google Enterprise partner, Revevol has deployed more than 700,000 Google Apps Licenses (Enterprise and Education).
With a presence in 17 countries on 4 continents and a unique, global network of Certified Trainers, Revevol services the demands of multinational organizations.
